a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of recorded natural disaster events, 1900 to 2022
The number of global reported natural disaster events in any given year. This includes those from drought, floods,
extreme weather, extreme temperature, landslides, dry mass movements, wildfires, volcanic activity and earthquakes.
Data source: EM-DAT, CRED / Université catholique de Louvain, Brussels (Belgium)
